title: 玩家在服务器里破坏方块会蹦出来一句红色话
txt_content:
玩家在服务器里破坏方块会蹦出来一句红色话，但是玩家还是可以破坏方块，导致破坏有延迟，我吧那句话打出来
You don't have permission to do that!
惊奇的是还可以破坏233，求解，并别关掉这个东西，谢谢了




161731ec1d4f5a79.png (18.07 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-7-29 20:18 上传










161731ec1d4f5a79.png
(18.07 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2017-7-29 20:18 上传

replies.author: 见青山
replies.txt_content:
你是不是创建了一个新的用户组？如果是的话.
请给他mangaddp 用户组 essentials.build。这样这个组就可以破坏方块了

如果不是的话请说明你想实现什么，是破坏方块还是不破坏方块？是显示红字还是不显示红字？

replies.author: absc123
replies.txt_content: 你没有权限执行，请去看看groupmanager中的配置文件检查权限组

absc123 发表于 2017-7-30 10:58
你没有权限执行，请去看看groupmanager中的配置文件检查权限组
检查了，还是蹦出来红字

18098720970 发表于 2017-7-29 21:00
你是不是创建了一个新的用户组？如果是的话.
请给他mangaddp 用户组 essentials.build。这样这个组就可以破 ...
破坏方块，不显示红字

replies.author: LingXin233
replies.txt_content: 请把Groupmanager/world/group.yml的配置文件发上来

LingXin233 发表于 2017-7-30 12:34
请把Groupmanager/world/group.yml的配置文件发上来
好的，我去发

LingXin233 发表于 2017-7-30 12:34
请把Groupmanager/world/group.yml的配置文件发上来
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  vip3:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.feed
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.workbench
    - hungerkeeperplus.bypass
    - ke.cnnick.color
    - ke.cnnick.set
    - quickshop.vip3
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&a&l[&d&lSVIP&a&l]'
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  vip2:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.feed
    - essentials.workbench
    - hungerkeeperplus.bypass
    - ke.cnnick.set
    - quickshop.vip2
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&a&l[&d&lMVIP&a&l]'
      suffix: ''
  cg:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - EasyKits.kits.1
    - EasyKits.kits.maxuse
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.togglejail
    - essentials.tp
    - plotme.limit.1
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.use.add
    - plotme.use.remove
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&4[&a&l城管&4]&2'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.sethome
    - -essentials.home
    - chestcommands.item.bs.yml
    - chestcommands.item.dqsd.yml
    - chestcommands.item.viplibao.yml
    - chestcommands.open.baoshi.yml
    - chestcommands.open.bs.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cd.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cs.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cuilian.yml
    - chestcommands.open.dqsd.yml
    - chestcommands.open.example.yml
    - chestcommands.open.exampleyml
    - chestcommands.open.jj.yml
    - chestcommands.open.rpg.yml
    - chestcommands.open.sl.yml
    - chestcommands.open.viplb.yml
    - chestcommands.open.viplibao.yml
    - com.ivsevsmod.ivsevs.commands.EVs
    - com.ivsevsmod.ivsevs.commands.HiddenPower
    - com.ivsevsmod.ivsevs.commands.IVs
    - EasyKits.kits.1
    - EasyKits.kits.cd
    - EasyKits.kits.maxuse
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.kits.day
    - essentials.sethome
    - InfoBoard.View
    - PlayerPoints.me
    - plotme.limit.1
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.use.add
    - plotme.use.remove
    - plots.auto
    - plots.claim
    - plots.use
    - plots.use.add
    - plots.use.remove
    - quickshop.buy
    - quickshop.sell
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&b[创新居民]'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []

    - g:groupmanager_admin

    - essentials.build

      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''

replies.author: LingXin233
replies.txt_content:
13807243788 发表于 2017-7-30 18:39
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
把需要的权限组里的
    info:
      build: false ->>true
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''
------------------------------改成
    info:
      build: true
----------------------------------
看得懂吧？

replies.author: LingXin233
replies.txt_content:
LingXin233 发表于 2017-7-30 22:41
把需要的权限组里的
    info:
      build: false ->>true
只更改build: 那一项
